Train Wreck sped out of the way.

Train Wreck: That's it, the Maximals have=
 obviously turned over a new leaf and are acting like Predacons, let's get =
out of here!

The Radicons got aboard Train Wreck and he went speeding off,=
 ripping up the ground with his dented wheels as he raced towards the Maxim=
al base...
